question_stem: 1. 关于"流行病学"，下列说法哪项是错误的： (2.0分)
choice: A.流行病学中的研究群体是指所有人群 B.流行病学是从群体角度研究疾病与健康 C.流行病学从疾病分布入手探讨疾病的流行因素 D.流行病学属于预防医学的范畴 E.流行病学已深入临床医学的研究中
correct_answer: A.流行病学中的研究群体是指所有人群

question_stem: 2. 下列哪一种指标常用来说明疾病对人的生命危险程度： (2.0分)
choice: A.罹患率 B.死亡率 C.患病率 D.发病率 E.病死率

question_stem: 3. 表示传染病的流行强度宜用下列哪种指标： (2.0分)
choice: A.发病率 B.死亡率 C.罹患率 D.患病率 E.病死率

question_stem: 4. 某县历年流脑发病率均在12/10万~20/10万之间,去年该县流脑发病率为16/10万,试判断其流行强度： (2.0分)
choice: A.大流行 B.暴发 C.流行 D.散发 E.以上均不对

question_stem: 5. 下列哪一种传染病一般呈严格的季节性： (2.0分)
choice: A.虫媒传染病  B.呼吸道传染病 C.寄生虫病 D.肠道传染病 E.血液传染病

question_stem: 6. 某地共有居民200000人，2003年罹患SARS 20人,其中死亡1人，该地2003年SARS的（ ）为5%。(2.0分)
choice: A.病死率 B.发病率 C.患病率 D.罹患率 E.以上都不对

question_stem: 7. 人类染色体核型分析中不包括哪些特征： (2.0分)
choice: A.染色体形态特征 B.染色体大小 C.染色体数目 D.染色体复制

question_stem: 8. 下列哪条染色体是亚中着丝粒染色体： (2.0分)
choice: A.3号染色体 B.2号染色体 C.22染色体 D.13号染色体

question_stem: 9. 单链DNA迁移率与下列哪种因素无关： (2.0分)
choice: A.凝胶浓度 B.DNA的碱基序列 C.DNA长度 D.电泳时间

question_stem: 10. 下哪项不能作为判断G带制备好坏的标准：(2.0分)
choice: A.细胞完整，轮廓清晰，染色体在同一平面上均匀分布 B.所观察的染色体长短大致一样，处于同一有丝分裂时期 C.染色体形态和分散良好，最好无重叠现象，即使染色体个别重叠，也要能明显辨别 D.在所观察的染色体周围有多个散在的染色体
correct_answer: D.在所观察的染色体周围有多个散在的染色体

question_stem: 11. If the normal sequence of genes on a chromosome is ABCDEFG, then a change in the sequence to AEDCBFG would be an example of a(2.0分)
choice: A.Missense mutation B.Frame shift mutation C.Inversion D.Translocation E.Duplication

question_stem: 12. Polymorphisms(2.0分)
choice: A.Refer to multiple conformations observed for the same sequence of DNA B.Refers to allelic variations that are common ( in >1% of population)  C.Are produced by insertions or deletions D.Refer to the mutant sequence of DNA from patients E.Are produced by inversion
correct_answer: B.Refers to allelic variations that are common ( in >1% of population)

question_stem: 13. The best estimate for the number of human genes is:(2.0分)
14. Which of the following cell types would not be a possible source of DNA?(2.0分)
choice: A.Skin cells. B.Brain cells. C.Liver cells. D.Red blood cells. E.Heart cells.

question_stem: 15. A mechanism of epigenetic inheritance is(2.0分)
choice: A.genomic imprinting B.non-coding RNAs C.DNA methylation D.histone modification E.All of the above

question_stem: 16. A male is found to have a 46 CAG repeats. Which of the following disorders is the most likely diagnosis?(2.0分)
choice: A.Huntington disease B.Friedreich ataxia C.Fragile-X-associated Tremor Ataxia Syndrome D.Fragile X syndrome E.Myotonic dystrophy

question_stem: 17. The process that allows humans to be more complex than common weeds such as Arabadopsis (拟南芥。一种十字花科植物。模式生物), despite an equivalent number of genes, is(2.0分)
choice: A.nucleotide polymorphisms B.transcription C.nucleotide expansion D.alternative splicing E.translation

question_stem: 18. Robertsonian translocations(2.0分)
choice: A.Are the most common chromosome rearrangements in human. B.Occur with roughly equal frequency for all autosomal chromosomes. C.Account for Down syndrome in about 95% of the cases. D.Are unbalanced translocations. E.Involve the deleterious loss of sole copies of genes for ribosomal RNA.
correct_answer: A.Are the most common chromosome rearrangements in human.

question_stem: 19. Which of the following karyotypes is not compatible with survival to birth?(2.0分)
20. In a Robertsonian translocation fusion occurs at the:(2.0分)
choice: A.histones. B.centromeres. C.telomeres. D.ends of the long arms. E.Middle of the long arms.

question_stem: 21. The cause of Down's syndrome is known to be(2.0分)
choice: A.the absence of one autosome B.the presence of one extra sex chromosome C.the presence of one extra autosome D.a pituitary（垂体）deficiency E.a pair of recessive genes
correct_answer: C.the presence of one extra autosome

question_stem: 22. The presence of two or more cell lines from different zygotes in a single individual is known as:(2.0分)
choice: A.mosaicism. B.aneuploidy.（非整倍体） C.diploidy. （二倍体） D.euploidy. （整倍体） E.chimaerism.

question_stem: 23. Which of the following is an example of monosomy?(2.0分)
choice: A.69,XYY B.46,XX C.45,X D.47,XXX E.46,XX,5p-

question_stem: 24. Disorders with this mode of inheritance are sometimes found more commonly in societies that practice consanguinity: (2.0分)
choice: A.autosomal recessive B.X-linked C.autosomal dominant D.multifactorial E.cancer

question_stem: 25. Both of Mary's sons have the X-linked disorder Duchenne muscular dystrophy. A deletion in the DMD gene is found in each of the boys, but no mutation in DMD is found when a blood sample from Mary is analyzed. What is the most likely explanation? (2.0分)
choice: A.The mutation was inherited from the boys' father  B.The boys were affected by separate mutation events in DMD C.Mary is germline mosaic for a DMD deletion D.The phenotype is not penetrant in Mary  E.The phenotype is X-linked recessive
correct_answer: C.Mary is germline mosaic for a DMD deletion

question_stem: 26. Which inheritance pattern best describes the pedigree shown here?(2.0分)
choice: A.XD B.AD C.XR D.AR E.Mitochodrial

question_stem: 27. Male to male transmission is a key feature of which pattern of inheritance?(2.0分)
choice: A.AR B.XR C.AD D.XD E.Mitochodrial

question_stem: 28. Which of the following disorders does NOT show X-linked inheritance?(2.0分)
choice: A.Tay-Sachs disease B.Hemophilia B C.Duchenne muscular dystrophy D.Hemophilia A E.Red-green blindness

question_stem: 29. Leber hereditary optic atrophy (LHON) is caused by a mutation in:(2.0分)
choice: A.chromosome 13. B.chromosome 21. C.chromosome 18. D.chromosome 5. E.mitochondrial DNA.

question_stem: 30. A dominantly inherited trait affects a child and his grandmother, but neither parent. This best illustrates which of the following principles?(2.0分)
choice: A.New mutation. B.Non-penetrance C.Variable expressivity. D.Somatic mosaicism. E.Genomic imprinting

question_stem: 31. Which of the following genes conveys susceptibility for polygenic Alzheimer disease? (2.0分)
choice: A.PS1 B.APP C.PS2 D.APOE E.DMD

question_stem: 32. Which of the following conditions does NOT show multifactorial inheritance? (2.0分)
choice: A.Spina bifida (neural tube defects)（脊柱裂。神经管缺陷） B.Schizophrenia C.Pyloric stenosis（幽门狭窄） D.Hirschsprung disease（先天性巨结肠症） E.Marfan syndrome

question_stem: 33. In a condition such as hypertension the recurrence risk will be greatest for which of the following relatives of an affected individual?(2.0分)
choice: A.Nephew  B.Brother C.Grandchild D.Aunt E.Grandchild's child

question_stem: 34. The proportion of genes shared by first cousins is on average ___.(2.0分)

35. A study of a disorder reveals that monozygotic twins are concordant 40% of the time, whereas full siblings are concordant 10% of the time. Which of the following is the best interpretation of this finding?(2.0分)
choice: A.Genes contribute to the trait, but are not deterministic. B.The trait has no genetic component. C.The trait is completely determined by genetics. D.The trait is completely determined by environmental factors.. E.The trait must be due to the biology of twinning.
correct_answer: A.Genes contribute to the trait, but are not deterministic.

question_stem: 36. A case-control association study indicates a 1.6 fold relative risk of diabetes in individuals who carry a specific allele. What is the most reasonable interpretation of this result?(2.0分)
choice: A.The allele causes the trait in the study population. B.The allele may not cause the trait, but the gene does cause the trait in the study population. C.There is an association between the allele and expressing the trait in the population that was studied. D.The allele is closely linked to another allele that causes the trait in the study population. E.No association exists between the allele and diabetes in the study population.
correct_answer: C.There is an association between the allele and expressing the trait in the population that was studied.

question_stem: 37. To say that two alleles are in linkage disequilibrium implies that:(2.0分)
choice: A.The alleles function together in the same pathway. B.The alleles are so close that recombination never occurs between them. C.The two alleles are together in the same haplotype more often that predicted by chance. D.One allele arose from the other by mutation. E.The alleles have relationship.
correct_answer: C.The two alleles are together in the same haplotype more often that predicted by chance.

question_stem: 38. Why might a woman opt for chrionic villus sampling (CVS) over amniocentesis for prenatal diagnosis？ (2.0分)
choice: A.It is more accurate than amniocentesis.  B.More doctors are trained to perform CVS than amniocentesis.  C.It can be performed earlier in gestation.  D.There are much lower complication rates for CVS.  E.More genetic disorders can be found by CVS than by amniocentesis.
correct_answer: C.It can be performed earlier in gestation.

question_stem: 39. The risk for miscarriage associated with amniocentesis is approximately ____.(2.0分)

40. Availability of DNA testing for many single disease traits has allowed routine prenatal screening of couples for disorders prevalent in their ethnic group. Which of the following genetic disorders has a similar incidence in different ethnic groups and wou(2.0分)
choice: A.Tay-Sachs disease B.Thalassemias C.Cystic fibrosis D.Down syndrome E.Huntington disease

question_stem: 41. Which of the following techniques was NOT used to detect an unknown mutation?(2.0分)
choice: A.ASO B.SSCP C.DHPLC D.DGGE E.DNA sequencing

question_stem: 42. Which of the following prenatal diagnostic techniques routinely allows fetal chromosomes to be analyzed during first trimester of pregnancy?(2.0分)
choice: A.Radiography B.Chorionic villus sampling C.Cordocentesis D.Amniocentesis E.Maternal triple testing

question_stem: 43. Who won the Nobel Prize for His (their) contributions to PCR technique?(2.0分)
choice: A.Sanger F B.Southern E C.Mullis K D.Watson J and Crick F E.Yuet Wai Kan

question_stem: 44. For what purpose are prenatal screening tests best used?(2.0分)
choice: A.To diagnose a suspected disease in a parent B.To diagnose a suspected disease in a fetus   C.To obtain fetal cells for chromosome karyotyping D.To identify individuals who should undergo diagnostic testing E.To examine the DNA of a fetus for suspected mutations in a specific gene
correct_answer: D.To identify individuals who should undergo diagnostic testing

question_stem: 45. The majority of vectors used for gene transfer in the clinical setting are derived from: (2.0分)
choice: A.automated DNA synthesis B.insects C.bacteria D.viruses E.yeast

question_stem: 46. Gene therapy is an established, broadly available procedure for the treatment of: (2.0分)
choice: A.melanoma B.deafness C.hemophilia D.cystic fibrosis E.no disease as yet

question_stem: 47. Becky is a 7-day-old infant who has phenylketonuria. Her parents have come to you for advice on managing her condition. Which of the following statements most accurately describes the best management for this disorder? (2.0分)
choice: A.All protein must be eliminated from the diet.  B.A high-protein diet in a pregnant mother causes phenylketonuria.  C.A protein-restricted diet must be followed.  D.A high-protein diet must be followed  E.A high-protein diet must be followed.
correct_answer: C.A protein-restricted diet must be followed.

question_stem: 48. Advantages of using adenoviruses for gene therapy include:(2.0分)
choice: A.long term expression. B.low risk of insertional mutagenesis. C.short term expression. D.low immunogenecity. E.easy assembly.

question_stem: 49. Which of the following is the usual treatment of hemophilia A?(2.0分)
choice: A.Infusion of factor VIII as needed B.Blood transfusion C.Liver transplant D.Bone marrow transplant E.Spleen transplant
correct_answer: A.Infusion of factor VIII as needed

question_stem: 50. Which of the following gene-therapy vectors preferentially infects nerve cells?(2.0分)
choice: A.Adenovirus B.Retrovirus C.Herpes virus D.Adeno-associated virus E.Liposome

question_stem: 1. The TATA box is located in the(2.0分)
choice: A.Splice enhancer. B.Intron-exon border. C.Poly-A addition site. D.Promoter E.Cap site.

choice: A.G1期 B. S 期 C. G2期  D. M 期

choice: A.促进染色体凝集 B.促进红细胞解体 C.细胞周期阻滞在有丝分裂中期    D.刺激淋巴细胞增殖。

choice: A.红细胞解体 B.染色体分散 C.白细胞膨胀 D.淋巴细胞解体

question_stem: 10. The splice donor is located(2.0分)
choice: A.At the 5' end of the intron. B.At the promoter. C.At the branch point of the intron. D.At the 3' end of the intron. E.At the enhancer.
correct_answer: A.At the 5' end of the intron.

question_stem: 11. Types of nucleic acid hybridisation include the below EXCEPT(2.0分)
choice: A.Northern blotting B.Southern blotting C.Microarray D.Western blotting E.DNA fingerprinting

question_stem: 12. 若单个样本的SSCP结果为阳性，这说明： (2.0分)
choice: A.样本检测区域无突变   B.样本检测区域有突变 C.样本一定为致病突变 D.无法分析

question_stem: 13. 疾病的时间分布中，周期性是指： (2.0分)
choice: A.对疾病动态的连续数年乃至数十年的观察，在这个长时间内观察探讨疾病的病原体、临床表现、发病率、死亡率等的变化或它们同时发生的变化情况 B.疾病发生频率经过一个相当规律的时间间隔，呈现规律性变动的状况 C.以日、周、月计数的短期观察数据 D.疾病每年在一定的季节内呈现发病率升高的现象 E.以上都不对
correct_answer: B.疾病发生频率经过一个相当规律的时间间隔，呈现规律性变动的状况

question_stem: 14. G带制备中染色体带型不好的原因不包括： (2.0分)
choice: A.Giemsa染色时间不够 B.染色体标本不好    C.胰酶消化时间不合适 D.显微镜分辨率不够

question_stem: 19. 有关窗技术的，下列关于窗位的概念，正确的是(2.0分)
choice: A.窗位与所显示的组织CT直无关 B.窗位规定所显示CT直的范围 C.不同机器的窗位值不同 D.床位相当于显示灰阶的中心 E.通常窗位选择以水的CT直为标准
correct_answer: D.床位相当于显示灰阶的中心

question_stem: 20. SSCP分析的检测灵敏度主要与哪个因素有关： (2.0分)
choice: A.核酸片段大小 B.引物序列 C.碱基突变类型      D.DNA的碱基序列

question_stem: 21. 秋水仙素在人类染色体制备过程的作用机理： (2.0分)
choice: A.促进淋巴细胞解体 B.细胞周期阻滞在有丝分裂中期    C.促进染色体合成 D.刺激淋巴细胞增殖。
correct_answer: B.细胞周期阻滞在有丝分裂中期

question_stem: 22. SSCP的电泳结果应分析哪种形态的DNA： (2.0分)

question_stem: 24. 下述中，关于像素和体素的不准确的概念是哪项(2.0分)
choice: A.像素大小与图像的分辨率高低成反比 B.CT图像的基本组成单元称为体素 C.体素是一个三维概念 D.体素是被矩阵排列分隔的基本成像单元 E.像素实际上是体素在成像时的表现
correct_answer: B.CT图像的基本组成单元称为体素

question_stem: 25. An example of genomic imprinting is (2.0分)
choice: A.Differentiation of cells to form a specific tissue B.Covalent modification of histones C.Mosaicism D.Paternal X inactivation

question_stem: 26. 某社区共有居民500人，2009年4月新发甲型H1N1流感病例10人，截至2009年6月底，共有甲型H1N1流感病例50人，则该社区2009年4月甲型H1N1流感（ ）为2%。(2.0分)
choice: A.发病率  B.患病率 C.病死率 D.罹患率 E.死亡率

choice: A.骨 B.空气 C.水 D.脑组织 E.以上都不是

question_stem: 32. Which of the following statements is true of X inactivation?  (2.0分)
choice: A.There will be two Barr bodies in each somatic cell of an XXX female B.The paternal X is always inactive in female somatic cells  C.Because of X inactivation, males with an XXY genotype have no apparent phenotype  D.The entire inactivated X chromosome is transcriptionally silent E.X inactivation hypothesis was first proposed by Francis Collins
correct_answer: A.There will be two Barr bodies in each somatic cell of an XXX female

question_stem: 34. A nonsense mutation involves (2.0分)
choice: A.the creation of a stop codon. B.an AG splice acceptor site. C.the creation of a different amino acid. D.a regulatory sequence. E.the creation of the same amino acid.
correct_answer: A.the creation of a stop codon.

question_stem: 37. Two parents with autosomal recessive albinism have a child who does not have albinism. This is best explained by:(2.0分)
choice: A.Genetic heterogeneity. B.Misattributed paternity.（亲子关系出错） C.An incorrect diagnosis in one parent. D.Reversion of one of the mutant alleles to wild type. E.Pleiotropy.

question_stem: 38. A thalassemia is a hemoglobin disorder in which(2.0分)
choice: A.The beta-globin chain is absent or is present at reduced levels B.Any globin chain is present at normal levels but is misfolded C.The beta-globin chain is present at normal levels but is misfolded D.Any globin chain is absent or is present at reduced levels E.Either B or D is true, depending upon the type of thalassemia
correct_answer: D.Any globin chain is absent or is present at reduced levels

question_stem: 39. The presence of genes in the same chromosome is an example of (2.0分)
choice: A.Coordination B.Free assortment C.Segregations D.Linkage  E.Fusion

question_stem: 41. CT探测器的作用是(2.0分)
choice: A.探测扫描时散射线是多少 B.探测病人位置是否准确 C.探测中心线是否准直 D.探测透过射线以获得正确曝光量 E.探测透过射线以获得测量数据
correct_answer: E.探测透过射线以获得测量数据

C.Gene B is expressed at a higher level and gene A at a lower level in the patient than the control, and gene C is not present at all in the patient. D.The mRNA from gene A is degraded more rapidly and that from gene B less rapidly in the patient than the control, and the mRNA from gene C is not present at all in the patient. E.Either A or B

question_stem: 42. In the beta-thalassemia case presented in the first week, one might imagine that an embryonic stem cell transplant might cure 何尼科. Where would one obtain such cells?   (2.0分)
choice: A.From the umbilicord cord blood（脐带血） B.From the chorion（绒毛膜） C.From the inner cell mass of the blastocyst（胚泡的内细胞团） D.From the syncytiotrophoblast（合体滋养层） E.From the white blood cells
correct_answer: C.From the inner cell mass of the blastocyst（胚泡的内细胞团）

question_stem: 45. Which of the following properties would a single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) have to be detected by Southern blot?   (2.0分)
choice: A.It must alter the encoded amino acid sequence B.It must alter a splice site  C.It must alter a restriction site D.It must be a nonsense mutation E.It must alter the stability of the encoded mRNA
correct_answer: C.It must alter a restriction site

question_stem: 3. Which of the following must be true for gene therapy to ameliorate（改善）a genetic disease?(3.0分)
choice: A.The gene therapy vector（载体） must be able to access all cells in the body.  B.A wild-type（野生型） level of the encoded gene product must be achieved.  C.The mutated gene must be excised（切除） and replaced.  D.There must be a limited immune response（免疫反应） to the gene therapy vector.  E.The disease mutation must cause a gain of function（功能获得）.
correct_answer: D.There must be a limited immune response（免疫反应） to the gene therapy vector.

question_stem: 6. Suppose you are attempting to find a disease-causing gene（假设你准备寻找某个新疾病基因）, and you have identified a number of families in which the disease is transmitted（假设你准备寻找某个新疾病基因，手头已有多个疾病家系）. If you have no knowledge of the gene product and no reasonable candidate locus（如果你还不知道相关的基因产物和可能的候选基因座）, which of the following would be the FIRST technique you would be most likely to use?(3.0分)
choice: A.Linkage analysis（连锁分析） B.DNA sequencing（DNA测序） C.Single strand conformation polymorphism (SSCP) analysis D.Denaturing high-performance liquid chromatography (dHPLC) E.Fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH)

question_stem: 15. Several genetic disorders exhibit genetic association with markers in the major histocompatibility complex region（组织相容性复合体区域。即HLA）. Which of the following factors complicates the further dissection of these associations?(3.0分)
choice: A.Few markers（标志） are found in this region.  B.High levels of linkage disequilibrium（连锁不平衡） are found in this region.  C.Low levels of sequence polymorphism are found in this region.  D.Expression of these genes is limited.  E.There is hypermutability（超突变性） of the region.
correct_answer: B.High levels of linkage disequilibrium（连锁不平衡） are found in this region.

question_stem: 16. Which one of the following conditions is NOT usually regarded as multifactorial?(3.0分)
choice: A.Rheumatoid arthritis（类风关） B.Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus（胰岛素依赖型糖尿病） C.McCune-Albright syndrome（McCune-Albright综合征） D.Asthma（哮喘） E.Parkinson disease（Parkinson病）

question_stem: 19. Which of the following is NOT often seen in the individual with Klinefelter syndrome?(3.0分)
choice: A.webbed neck（蹼颈） B.ncreased stature（身长） C.diminished IQ (on average)（轻度智力障碍） D.sterility（不育） E.Gynecomastia（男子乳腺发育）

question_stem: 28. 利用出生队列资料将疾病年龄分布和时间分布结合起来描述的一种方法叫做： (3.0分)
choice: A.横断面分析   B.生态学分析   C.出生队列分析   D.回顾性分析    E.以上都不对

question_stem: 31. 有关窗技术的，下列关于组织显示图像灰阶密度高低的描述，正确的是(3.0分)
choice: A.窗宽显示密度范围外的组织不能显示，图像表现为黑色 B.与窗位CT值相同的组织显示中等亮度，适于观察 C.无论不同组织密度差异大小，任何图像上肉眼都能发现差别 D.窗宽范围以上的组织显示纯黑色 E.窗宽范围以下的组织显示为纯白色
correct_answer: B.与窗位CT值相同的组织显示中等亮度，适于观察

question_stem: 33. 某女 has mitochondrial encephalomyopathy and stroke-like episodes (MELAS). Her genetic counselor tells her that it is very difficult to predict the severity（严重程度） of the syndrome in any affected children that she will have. choice: A.mutation heteroplasmy（杂质性） B.incomplete dominance（不完全显性） C.pleiotropy（多效性） D.epistasis（）上位性 E.the lack of DNA repair enzymes（DNA修复酶） in mitochondria

question_stem: 30. Which is false about cffDNA (cell-free fetal DNA in maternal blood)?(2.5分)

question_stem: 35. Which of the following is NOT currently a candidate（候选） for gene therapy?(2.5分)

question_stem: 38. 关于CT重建技术的临床应用，描述错误的是：(2.5分)

choice: A.interphase B.prophase C.metaphase D.anaphase E.telophase

question_stem: 23. A person is found to be homozygous（纯合子） for the ε4 allele at ApoE. Which of the following statements regarding his risk of Alzheimer disease is true?(2.5分)
choice: A.He will almost certainly develop Alzheimer disease. B.He is protected from Alzheimer disease. C.He is at increased risk of Alzheimer disease. D.This result has no bearing on his risk of Alzheimer disease. E.This result is a positive false.
correct_answer: C.He is at increased risk of Alzheimer disease.

question_stem: 38. Which, if any, of the following statements is false?(2.5分)
choice: A.RNA interference (RNAi) is a cellular defense mechanism that is triggered by       the presence in cells of unnatural double-stranded RNA, as can occur after       viral infections. B.RNAi therapy is a type of RNA-targeted therapy in which specific       double-stranded RNA constructs are engineered to appear in diseased cells in       order to incite the cells to destroy any RNA that contains the same sequence. C.By destroying RNAs that are related to a specifically introduced genetic      construct, artificial RNAi is effectively a type of gene-specific silencing. D.RNAi therapy is best suited to silencing genes so as to replicate a phenotype      caused by loss-of-function mutations. E.Drs. Fire and Mello discovered RNAi phenomenon in 1998 and got a Nobel      Prize in 2006.
correct_answer: D.RNAi therapy is best suited to silencing genes so as to replicate a phenotype      caused by loss-of-function mutations.

question_stem: 20. 在鉴定疾病基因时，要确定可能的疾病候选基因及其所在的染色体区域。关于疾病候选基因的选取，下列哪一项描述不对？(2.5分)
choice: A.候选基因发生功能失去突变，可导致相关疾病的表型 B.构建了相关的种间同源基因（orthologous gene）动物模型之后，发现动物具有相似的疾病表型 C.候选基因的不同突变均可导致相关疾病的表型 D.候选基因的基因表达谱与相关疾病的表型吻合 E.候选基因可以为假基因
correct_answer: E.候选基因可以为假基因

choice: A.单倍体 B.三倍体 C.单体  D.三体 E.部分三体
A.某一女性体内发生了染色体的插入 B.某一男性体内发生了染色体的易位 C.某一男性带有等臂染色体 D.某一女性个体带有易位型的畸变染色体 E.某一男性个体含有缺失型的畸变染色体
correct_answer: B.某一男性体内发生了染色体的易位

question_stem: 32. 下列哪一项描述aCGH检测优于FISH的说法是正确的?(2.5分)
choice: A.aCGH可分辨出平衡性重排（如易位、倒位等）。 B.aCGH分析无须进行细胞培养，因而出具检测报告的时间更快。 C.aCGH 进行检测的重复性高，可精确确定畸变发生的位置。 D.B和C都对 E.以上说法都对

question_stem: 33. 关于孕妇血浆中的胎儿游离DNA（cell-free fetal DNA，cfDNA）的检测技术，哪一项叙述是错误的？(2.5分)
choice: A.可用于确定胎儿的性别 B.可用于确定胎儿的Rh血型 C.不能确定胎儿的染色体核型 D.目前尚不能确定胎儿罹患脊柱裂（spina bifida）的风险 E.已经用于诊断胎儿是否感染了HIV感染

choice: A.补其所缺 B.去其所余 C.酶疗法 D.维生素疗法 E.禁其所忌

question_stem: 39. 关于遗传病的基因治疗，下列哪一项叙述是正确的？(2.5分)
choice: A.用于基因治疗的载体应该能够进入身体的所有细胞中  B.被转入的基因的表达产物应该达到野生型基因表达的那种水平  C.突变基因应该被切除和替代掉 D.用于基因治疗的载体引起的机体免疫反应应该很小 E.用于基因治疗的遗传病的突变类型必须是功能获得突变

choice: A.基因失活 B.基因添加 C.基因修复 D.基因复制 E.基因突变

question_stem: 1. 地方性疾病是指(2.5分)
choice: A.局限与某些特定地区内相对稳定并经常发生的疾病 B.发生频率经过一个相当规律的时间间隔，呈现规律性变动的状况的疾病 C.发病多集中在少数几个月内，具有严格季节性的疾病 D.虽一年四季均发病，但仅在一定月份发病升高的疾病 E.以上都不对
correct_answer: A.局限与某些特定地区内相对稳定并经常发生的疾病

question_stem: 2. 下列哪一项不涉及到细胞重编程技术?(2.5分)
choice: A. "中中"和"华华"克隆猴的出生 B.CAR-T细胞治疗患急性淋性白血病的Emily Whitehead C.诱导多能干细胞分化心肌细胞治疗心肌梗塞 D.濒危动物的无性繁殖的某些技术
correct_answer: B.CAR-T细胞治疗患急性淋性白血病的Emily Whitehead

question_stem: 3. 下列哪一项不属于细胞/基因治疗的范畴？(2.5分)
choice: A.AAV介导的RPE65基因突变导致的视网膜病变 B.多能干细胞分化得到的视网膜色素上皮细胞治疗老年黄斑变性. C.PD1抗体治疗淋巴瘤 D.能够分泌PD1抗体的多能干细胞分化的免疫细胞治疗

question_stem: 4. 下列哪一项不是CRISPR/CAS9技术在基因/细胞治疗上的应用：(2.5分)
choice: A.敲除免疫细胞上的checkpoint分子基因用于免疫细胞治疗 B.敲低某一致病RNA, 降低基因的表达但不影响DNA的序列 C.过表达某一缺失的基因用于治疗贫血症 D.修改一个单碱基的变异用于治疗单基因遗传罕见病
correct_answer: C.过表达某一缺失的基因用于治疗贫血症

question_stem: 5. 下列哪一项是正在我国进行的多能干细胞相关的临床试验：(2.5分)
choice: A.ES细胞分化多巴胺神经元前体细胞治疗帕金森症 B.iPS细胞分化的NK细胞治疗癌症 C.ES细胞分化的oligodendrocyte治疗spinal cord injury D.iPS细胞分化的beta细胞治疗I型糖尿病

question_stem: 6. 下列哪一项不是iPSC用于细胞治疗的优势？(2.5分)
choice: A.包含病人的遗传信息，用于自体移植不产生免疫排斥 B.重编程过程中有更低的可能性产生癌基因和抑癌基因上的突变 C.能够无限扩增 D.可以得到单个细胞克隆分化得到的治疗用细胞
correct_answer: B.重编程过程中有更低的可能性产生癌基因和抑癌基因上的突变

question_stem: 7. 与X线摄影相比，CT利用X线的成像方式是(2.5分)
choice: A.衰减射线转换成数字信号后成像 B.利用衰减射线直接曝光成像 C.衰减射线转换成可见光后成像 D.利用衰减射线产生的荧光成像 E.利用衰减射线产生的穿透效应成像
correct_answer: A.衰减射线转换成数字信号后成像

question_stem: 10. 下列是国家卫生计生委和食品药品监管总局发布的干细胞临床试验相关政策的是：(2.5分)
choice: A.《干细胞临床研究管理办法》 B.《干细胞临床试验研究基地管理办法》 C.《干细胞制剂质量控制和临床前研究指导原则（试行）》 D.以上都是

question_stem: 12. 对多基因病而言，后代发病风险的估计与下列哪一个因素无关？(2.5分)
choice: A.群体发病率 B.孕妇年龄 C.家庭患病人数 D.病情严重程度 E.遗传率
A.感兴趣区的放大扫描 B.感兴趣区的扫描后放大 C.对感兴趣区进行小间隔重建 D.对感兴趣区进行高密度投影 E.对感兴趣区进行高分辨力扫描

choice: A.分子的化学毒性 B.渗透压毒性 C.致癌 D.变态反映 E.肝肾功能损害

question_stem: 15. 不同CT值范围提示不同的组织成分，下列叙述中错误的是(2.5分)
choice: A.3~18H提示为液体 B.20~80Hu提示为脂肪 C.-1000Hu提示为空气 D.80~300Hu提示为钙化 E.>400Hu提示为骨骼

question_stem: 17. 关于CT的临床应用，错误的是(2.5分)
choice: A.是眼眶内异物的首选检查方法 B.可以提高骨骼细微病变的检出率 C.CTA已成为四肢血管疾病的重要检查方法之一 D.对肺内病灶检出率较高 E.应逐渐将CT视为常规检查及诊断手段
correct_answer: E.应逐渐将CT视为常规检查及诊断手段

question_stem: 21. 流行病学的三间分布主要包括：(2.5分)

question_stem: 22. 某人被检测出为ApoE基因的ε4等位基因纯合子（即其基因型为：ε4/ε4）。该个体罹患阿尔兹海默症（Alzheimer disease）的风险为(2.5分)
choice: A.该个体几乎100%将罹患阿尔兹海默症。 B.该个体不会罹患阿尔兹海默症，因为ε4/ε4是抵抗基因型。 C.该个体罹患阿尔兹海默症的风险增高。 D.ε4/ε4基因型与阿尔兹海默症的发病无关。 E.该个体的基因分析结果为假阳性。

24. 罕见变异体（rare variant）是指(2.5分)
choice: A.在最近的进化史上出现的新突变（new mutations that have arisen in recent evolutionary history） B.在人群中存在了很长时间的旧突变（old mutations that are present in populations for a long time） C.可能是有害的（can be deleterious） D.A和C是对的 E.以上答案都不对

question_stem: 25. 理想的测序仪应该具备哪些特征？(2.5分)
choice: A.测序的读长越长越好 B.测序结果准确 C.高通量测序 D.以上都对 E.以上都不对

question_stem: 30. 下列关于平衡性相互易位的描述，哪一项正确？(2.5分)
choice: A.携带者通常具有显著的学习困难症状 B.某些携带者生育染色体非平衡子代的风险>10% C.平衡性相互易位要么累及染色体的长臂，要么累及染色体的短臂 D.平衡性相互易位不累及X染色体 E.在携带者的配子形成过程中，染色体配对形成四价体，原因在于2条染色体总是分配到2个子细胞中
correct_answer: B.某些携带者生育染色体非平衡子代的风险>10%
